document_data.name: Dawn
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dawn''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s and [[wizard]]s that created a searing beam of sunlight.
document_data.Effects: This spell created a massive cylinder of sunlight. The cylinder had a height of {{SI|40|ft|long=ye}} and a radius of {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}}. The caster was able to target the cylinder of light to any location within a range of {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}}. Creatures within the cylinder of light were temporarily blinded and/or suffered mild sunburns.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a sunburst pendant with a value of at least 100 [[gp]].
